articles.description: Premier League news and reaction as Manchester City and Arsenal draw 2-2 in an action-packed contest.
articles.title: Football latest: Reaction as Man City salvage late draw against 10-man Arsenal

articles.description: The Friedkin Group are in advanced discussions for a takeover of Everton after resuming talks with majority shareholder Farhad Moshiri.
articles.title: Everton takeover: Friedkin Group in advanced talks for deal

articles.description: Daniel Dubois has "all the tools" to take over the heavyweight division says his promoter Frank Warren as he calls for a rematch with Oleksandr Usyk.
articles.title: Daniel Dubois: Frank Warren wants re-match with Oleksandr Usyk

articles.description: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta says it is "a miracle" his side came so close to victory at Manchester City, despite claims the visitors employed "dark arts" in a dramatic draw at Etihad Stadium.
articles.title: Man City 2-2 Arsenal: Premier League draw at Etihad Stadium a 'miracle' despite 'dark arts'

articles.description: MOTD2 pundit Alan Shearer explains why Arsenal boss Mikel Arteta will be delighted with his players despite conceding a late equaliser at Manchester City.
articles.title: 'Mentally, physically and tactically, Arsenal show why they are a force'

articles.description: The Baltimore Ravens and Los Angeles Rams get their first wins of the season as the Kansas City Chiefs remain unbeaten on Sunday in week three of the NFL.
articles.title: NFL Results & Week 3 recap: Ravens, Rams beat Cowboys, 49ers, Chiefs win with defence

articles.description: Max Verstappen says issues such as his punishment for swearing may "decide my future" and are "really tiring".
articles.title: Max Verstappen: Issues such as swearing punishment 'not a way of continuing' in Formula 1

articles.description: Angry fans refusing to come into the stadium, and celebrating a win at Oktoberfest - BBC Sport rounds up action from the European leagues.
articles.title: Harry Kane celebrates Bayern Munich win at Oktoberfest, Conor Gallagher scores for Atletico Madrid, Roma fans protest

articles.description: Barcelona captain and goalkeeper Marc-Andre ter Stegen is to have knee surgery on Monday after suffering a ruptured patella tendon during Sunday's La Liga victory against Villarreal.
articles.title: Barcelona goalkeeper Marc-Andre ter Stegen to have knee surgery

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Inter Milan vs AC Milan in the Serie A
articles.title: Inter Milan vs AC Milan: Serie A - BBC Sport
